salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: Select Name,BillingState,Phone,Type,OwnerID from Account where Name=':Name'

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map { Name: $.name, Phone: $.number, BillingCity: $.billingCity, BillingCountry: $.billingCountry }
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map { Id: $.id, Name: $.name, BillingCity: $.billingCity, Phone: $.number, BillingCountry: $.billingCountry, BillingState: $.billingState }
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- { Id: "0015j00000WdvP7AAJ", IsDeleted: false, Name: "Prathamesh", Type: "Customer-Direct", BillingState: "UK", Phone: "222-8987" }
